Top notch! The shotgun was now functioning like a charm.

Blackfang then looked at his halberd, and saw that it could use a 
little sharpening. Taking his bone knife, he managed to sharpen it 
as much as he could.

Blackfang: Now where is she? (jokingly) She sure takes her sweet 
time!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> KitKat:;
> 
> She looked at Cooley, "But, you are a Decepticon. The ones who 
came 
> before the predacon. The ones whose programs goevern ours. We 
> fashioned our existance from you. How can you say that your just a 
> plain anything. You are the ones whom the predacons are decended. 
You 
> are the orignal rulers. The ones who first fought the Autobots. 
From 
> there, we eventually took up the battle in the name of Decepticon 
> rule."
> 
> She sighed at this new world around her. She looked at her glass 
and 
> wondered why she ever wondered how her and a bot like Blackfang 
could 
> ever get along. She let her mind wander for a moment and wondered 
if 
> he even ever gave her a second thought. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > OOC:This is a time warp then to take care of the slight problem 
> that we had earlier right?
> > Cooley:
> > Looks to KitKat confused. "I might not be the one that you are 
> talking about. I am just normal Cooley," He smiles to her, "And 
> besides I have never had someone Bow to me before so Don't bow to 
me 
> please. and fill me in on this whole lord bit," He says with a 
smile. 
> > 
> > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She sat down and looked up at Cooley. "So, my lord, when will we 
> > engage in your brilliant plans?" she said with a smile. So far, 
she 
> > still had her Matrix holders intact. She had given one to 
Cooley, 
> but 
> > the other two she knew of were still connected to her spark. 
Hence 
> > her thoughts that the Matrix hated her. 
> > 
> > 
> >
